projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills in Web Development & Design, and further my development in learning the React Framework, TypeScript, TailWindCSS, and Next.js.

projects.name: HIIT Workout Tracker & Timer
projects.description: A personal web-based app to track HITT workouts and create customizable workouts (able to set number of sets, duration of workout set, and amount of rounds) with a timer.
